original: Lisper, Per (Pelle) Östen, stadsarkitekt SAR, Alingsås, f. 26/8/04 i Sala av järnhandi. Lisper Pelle Johnson o. Svea Landquist. G. 35 m. Mildred Andersson. Barn: Kersti f. 38, Peter 39, Mejt 46. — Stud:ex. i Sthlm 28, utex. fr. KTH 33. Anst. h. arkit. De-nis Sundberg i Umeå 35, h. arkit. Gunnar Hoving, Erik Friberger o. Anders Funkquist i Gbg 3’5-38, assist, v. länsarkit :kont. i Gbg 38-44, därefter stadsarkit. i Alingsås. Därjämte stads-arkit. även f. Kungälv 44-46, byggn :-konsulent f. Lerum, f. Vårgårda o. Nolby samma tid.
translated: Lisper, Per (Pelle) Östen, city architect SAR, Alingsås, b. 26/8/04 in Sala of an iron trader. Lisper Pelle Johnson and Svea Landquist. Married in 1935 to Mildred Andersson. Children: Kersti b. 1938, Peter b. 1939, Mejt b. 1946. Studied: high school graduation in Stockholm in 1928, graduated from KTH (Royal Institute of Technology) in 1933. Employed by architect Denis Sundberg in Umeå in 1935, by architects Gunnar Hoving, Erik Friberger, and Anders Funkquist in Gothenburg from 1935-1938, assistant to the county architect in Gothenburg from 1938-1944, then city architect in Alingsås. Also city architect in Kungälv from 1944-1946, building consultant for Lerum, Vårgårda, and Nolby during the same time.

worksFor.name: Gunnar Hoving, Erik Friberger, and Anders Funkquist
